name: 華國媛
objective: 本課程將介紹一系列的生物分子及這些生物分子所扮演的角色。課程從認識細菌、植物、動物細胞及各種細胞胞器開始，接著探討蛋白質、酵素、DNA、RNA結構和功能及他們在生命中的重要性。再論及DNA複製及轉錄和RNA轉譯成蛋白質的重要性及機制。PCR和DNA重組技術的重要性是安排在最後來介紹。
schedule:
Week　　Title
1.　　　　Central dogma
2.　　　　Amino acid, peptides and proteins
3.　　        Carbohydrates and glycobiology
4.　　　　Biological membranes and transport
5.　　　　Principles of Bioenergetics
6.　　　　Glycolysis
7.　　　　Aerobic metabolism: the citric acid cycle
8.            Aerobic metabolism: electron transport and oxidative phosphorylation (Quiz 1)
9.　　　　Mid-term Exam (25%)
10.　　　　Fatty acid catabolism (synthesis)
11.　　　　Biosynthesis of amino acid, nucleotides and related molecules
12.　　　　Amino acid oxidation and the production of urea
13.　　　　Genes and chromosomes
14.　　　　DNA metabolism
15.　　　　RNA metabolism
16.　　　　Biosingnaling
17.　　　　Regulation of gene expression (Quiz 10%)
18.　　　　Final EXAM (35%)
scorePolicy: Mid-term (25%) + Final Exam (35%) + Quiz (20%) + Class attendance (20%)
materials:
1. Lehninger’s Principles of Biochemistry,   2012, 6th ed by D. Nelson & M. Cox
2. Molecular Biology of the Cell, 2007,  6th ed, by Bruce Alberts , et al.
